attributes.action: demand of the HSE, that it remove the requirement that amateur dramatic societies have to keep plastic and wooden swords and similar plastic props under lock and key, controlled by a named person when not in use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present HSE regulations are a nonsense and do nothing to make the amateur pantomime safer. This is just another example of the HSE miss directing its energy/funds away from really serious workplace health risks.
